function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics increasing robot adoption","Impact":"Pandemics leading to higher robot adoption may increase inequality","Mitigation":"Implement policies to ensure fair distribution of benefits from robot adoption","Technologies":"Policy regulations, economic incentives for equitable access to robotics","People":"Population at risk of increased inequality due to robot adoption","Owner":"Government, policymakers, organizations advocating for equitable access to technology"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemics on changes in Gini coefficients","Impact":"Pandemics leading to changes in Gini coefficients may exacerbate inequality","Mitigation":"Implement policies to mitigate the impact of pandemics on income and wealth inequality","Technologies":"Economic support programs, social safety nets, targeted interventions for vulnerable groups","People":"Vulnerable populations at risk of exacerbated inequality","Owner":"Social welfare organizations, government, policymakers"},{"Description":"Skill-biased technological changes","Impact":"Pandemics may accelerate skill-biased technological changes leading to inequality","Mitigation":"Invest in education and training programs to prepare the workforce for technological advancements","Technologies":"Education and skill development initiatives, vocational training programs","People":"Workforce at risk of displacement and inequality due to technological changes","Owner":"Education institutions, employers, government"}]}
